description: WCZ files contain .JPG and .PNG files. The background and preview images must be saved as JPG files. The time-of-day image files must be saved in the PNG format and use the naming convention monthX.png , dayX.png , hourX.png , and minuteX.png , where X is the 0-12 months, 1-31 days, 0-23 hours, and 0-59 minutes. WCZ files may also include moonphase, AM/PM, and zodiac graphics.
Chameleon Clock wallpapers may range from 800x600 pixels to 2560x1600 pixels in size.
